definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Executive Stock Options (ESO) is a long-term and effective inspiriting mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 經營者股票期權激勵機制是一種長期有效的激勵制度。

sentences.english: Several concessionaires were asked to disclose their revenues and declined.
sentences.chinese: 幾個特許經營者被要求披露其收入和下降。

sentences.english: Cable broadcasting and television system operator.
sentences.chinese: 有線廣播電視系統經營者。

sentences.english: The MOFTEC may propose suggestions on pricing commitments to the export business operators.
sentences.chinese: 外經貿部可以向出口經營者提出價格承諾的建議。

sentences.english: It studies and analyses the feasibility of the ESO in china.
sentences.chinese: 分析研究了經營者股票期權在中國實踐的可行性。

sentences.english: That is why many owners of Dongguan factories are experimenting with other solutions.
sentences.chinese: 因此東莞許多工廠的經營者在嘗試其他的解決方法。

sentences.english: A fundamental difference exists between an enterprise operator and an enterprise designer.
sentences.chinese: 企業經營者和企業設計師之間存在着根本區別。

sentences.english: Education, in present management schools, trains operators of corporations.
sentences.chinese: 目前的管理學校，教育培養的是公司經營者。

sentences.english: The actual manager of the official capital money was the subordinate under the executive officer.
sentences.chinese: 至於本錢的實際經營者，則是判官之下的屬吏或屬司。

sentences.english: Newspaper proprietors hope to reverse some of these trends.
sentences.chinese: 日本報社的經營者希望扭轉局勢。

sentences.english: Where the franchised business operator requests for a hearing, the franchiser shall hold a hearing.
sentences.chinese: 特許經營者要求舉行聽證的，授權主體應當組織聽證。

sentences.english: Executives at both firms praised Mr. Pang as a savvy financier.
sentences.chinese: 兩家公司的經營者都稱，彭日成是一位精明的金融家。

sentences.english: All calibration is menu-driven and the operator is guided through every step.
sentences.chinese: 所有校準菜單驅動和引導經營者的每一步。

sentences.english: That first business was owned by the most unfriendly, grumpy person.
sentences.chinese: 第一家咖啡廳擁有最不友善，脾氣暴躁的經營者。

sentences.english: They did not use catch numbers reported by governments or fishing operators.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有把研究數據報告給政府和漁業經營者。

sentences.english: Our research results may provide a reference for CPBL and managements of teams.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究結果可提供職棒聯盟暨球團經營者的參考。

definition: to engage in (business etc)/to run/to operate
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
dealer/trader/person engaged in some industry or trade
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
developer (of real estate, a commercial product etc)
to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
